sources.title: Violence of Action | Full Movie | Steven Seagal Action | True Justice Series
sources.description:
Violence of Action - Bojan, a ghost from Kane’s past resurfaces and the CIA believes Bojan is in town to protect The Ghost’s personal money launderer - who is coming to town.  Kane wants to know what the Ghost is buying and knows these men will bring him the answers he needs to get one step closer to The Ghost.
2010.  Stars: *Steven Seagal*, Sarah Lind, William 'Big Sleeps' Stewart, Meghan Ory, Warren Christie
*Licensed from Voltage Pictures. All rights reserved*
